summary: Just a basic Longsword model base for your own designs.
descriptionHtml:
Thanks for taking a look at my very first piece of 3D model work. It is a simple Longsword with a practical historical design, to be used in your won works or projects, not just for Skyrim. No need to give credit if you use it, I just wanted to share my work and have your opinion on it, so that I can improve in the future and maybe try importing to the game. Any criticism you can give is appreciated.
   The blade was designed as a single mesh in Blender, and I have exported it into 3ds format as well for you. The pommel and hilt are very low-poly, and applying any modifiers to the mesh affected the entire thing. I know there are work-arounds, but I don't quite have the skill to mess around with these kinds of tools yet. Thus, it may seem a little bulky and crude-looking, but I've done my best. I may improve on it at some point but for now I am going to continue to work on other projects and learn how to import using Nifscope and the Creation Kit.

I've rambled long enough, please enjoy! :)
author: Thresh Productions
